content: mountain zen scarf designed by leslie taylor stevensville mt this is the perfect project for relaxing easy two row repeat that you can knit while socializing or watching tv makes a boomerang style scarf yarn 1 skein 100gm and at least 400 yds mountain colors twizzlefoot silkdance bearfoot or crazyfoot or a 5 mini skein perspective pack in twizzlefoot or crazyfoot needles #4 or 5 24 circular or size you need to achieve gauge gauge 4 5-5 sts per inch… but doesn t really matter for a scarf finished size approx 58 wide x 10 deep abbreviations kfb- knit into front of stitch then into back of st this is an increase 1 st yo- yarn over k2togtbl- k 2 sts together through the back of the stitch cast on 5 sts knit across row to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 2 k2 yo knit to last 2 sts k2togtbl row 3 knit across to last 2 sts kfb k1 place a removeable marker on row 2 side of scarf so it helps you remember this is the row with the yo etc repeat row 2 & 3 until 5 yards of yarn left bind off loosely
